entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Fuzzing] NrbfDecoderFuzzer: The output char buffer is too small to contain the decoded characters #107515
  • 'dynamic' keyword not working as expected #107512
  • JsonSchemaExporter.GetJsonSchemaAsNode cannot output array of fields for enum types with FlagsAttribute #107508
  • Rethrow stack trace reporting difference between NativeAOT and CoreCLR #107507
  • Random crash in native aot runtime code on win-x86 #107506
  • Performance of EVentSource (WriteEvent) is slow when compared across Amazon Linux distros #107505

Closed

  • JIT: cmp + jump + jump #101160
    Future
  • JIT: Simplify loop canonicalization #107175
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Fix corner-case accounting bug in new codeheap allocation #107514
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Convert some handle APIs from FCalls to fast FCall and slow QCall #107513
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Avoid using OpenThread for out of process SetThreadContext debugging #107511
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 128.0.6613.119, windows: 128.0.6613.120 #107504
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Remove unused declarations from clsload.hpp #107509
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement getClassAssemblyName #106959
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix corner-case accounting bug in new codeheap allocation #107492
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Convert `WaitHandle` FCalls to QCalls #107488
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Simplify block insertion logic during loop canonicalization #107371
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging][android] Bump to win 11 helix queue #107450
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • [release/8.0-staging] fix hang when `prepare_to_change_heap_count` fails #107485
    area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0] JIT: don't create vector constants from relocatable constants #107500
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [Mono AOT] Fix error when returning zero sized struct #107198
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.10
  • Convert Thread FCalls to QCalls #107495
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Expand "return condition" into "return condition ? true : false" #107499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add simple late layout pass #107483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Disable UnitTest_GVM_TypeLoadException for fullAOT jobs #107502
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2533437 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [wasm] more cases when looking up unmanaged delegates #107113
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, 10.0.0
  • [wasi] Process LinkerArg for wasi #107194
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-08
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Introduce `Experimental` MS Build Item likes `AssemblyMetadata`/`InternalsVisibleTo` #43270
  • `dotnet build` support export warnings/errors to json #43269

Updated

  • error MSB3231: Unable to remove directory #42963
  • Track signature errors #42870
  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: feed download failed #41590
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    Backlog
  • VMR Unified Linux Build Failing #41030
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • `slnx` support in the `dotnet` CLI #40913
    9.0.1xx
  • Dotnet tool command doesn't respect nuget packages path #15306
    Backlog
  • `dotnet run` - Notify user of segmentation fault #43250
  • global tools do not work #43171

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix issues with Blazor WASM delta applier #43271
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx] ResolvePackageReferences: PackageDependenciesDesignTime inherits transitive package DiagnosticLevel #43262
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Hot Reload: Handle file deletions correctly #42718
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Clean up some code #42775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Multi arch containers #43085
    Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0066 Convert switch statement to switch expression generates invalid code CS8506 #75021
  • Incorrect nullability analysis #75017

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix typo in ProjectCodeModelFactory.ProcessNextDocumentBatchAsync #75020
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Convert RudeEditDiagnostic to Diagnostic in EmitSolutionUpdateAsync #75013
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Field-backed properties: support partial properties with auto-implemented accessors and with initializers #74959
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Field Keyword
  • Semantic snippets: handle case with inline statement snippets before member access expression #74966
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: updates #57748
  • Perf improvement: json_spring, plaintext_spring #57747
  • Blazor nested [SupplyParameterFromQuery] causes exception on navigation #57746
  • @attribute [Authorize] does not work and does not redirect #57745

Closed

  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, plaintext #57723
  • Perf regression: updates #57744

PullRequests

Updated

  • Use System.Threading.Lock in Kestrel #57236
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [release/9.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `ff233bd` to `0953a17` #57643
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `ff233bd` to `0953a17` #57644
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `ff233bd` to `0953a17` #57645
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.x
  • ApiExplorer Support for HttpResults types for Controllers #57464
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Windows] Clearing and readding TabbedPage results in an inconsistent page size #24661
  • MAUI blazor , consequence JS api calling DO NOT WORK #24659
  • text to speech using Google instead of default Samsung configuration #24656
  • The DataTrigger in the CollectionView inside the Popup doesn't work correctly when scrolling #24655
  • Support for Sending POS Commands via Bluetooth in ESC-POS.NET #24654
  • Image Button in a nested flex layout not rendering #24653

Closed

  • When MinimumWidthRequest or MinimumHeightRequest are cleared on Windows, the old values stay in effect #24638
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Changing view size/layout/position does not update the shadow #24476
    Backlog
  • Shadow is not updating on change of parent control. #24034
  • Problem with accessing NavigatedToEventArgs.PreviousPage in OnNavigatedTo in Page #24657
  • Please support Linux as soon as possible, this is important for cross-platform developers #24642
  • The target Create IPA does not exist in the project. #24652

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Failed to inflate ColorStateList - error fix for CheckBox #24658
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-checkbox
  • Make sure that Navigation Pages fill the screen #24651

Merged

  • Fix layout when MinimumWidth/HeightRequest is removed on Windows #24639
  • Remove netPrevious TFMs from RC/GA #24488
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-rc2
  • [Android] invalidate shadows on parent's size change #24561
    platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨

Updated

  • Trigger InvalidateMeasure event on CollectionView when content size changes #24647
    community ✨
  • Don't invalidate SuperView if not connected to Window #24637
